# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experience. With its unique features and high-quality materials, this product stands out in its category. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase it for $75. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your lifestyle with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
